text:
[Verse]
Neon lights I'm running wild
City streets a crowded mile
Lost my way but found a smile
In this maze just stay a while

[Verse 2]
Chaos rules can't hear my thoughts
People rush in tangled knots
But your eyes connect like dots
When you find me all is not

[Chorus]
Lost in the city with you
Every moment feels brand new
Lost but it’s the best view
Together we break through

[Verse 3]
Sound of cars it's like a song
City nights can feel so long
But with you I feel so strong
In this place where we belong

[Bridge]
Concrete jungle tales untold
Every corner paved with gold
Midnight stories being sold
Hold my hand and lose control

[Verse 4]
Dreams unseen come into play
As the lights begin their sway
In the city night and day
With you there's no other way
title: Lost In the City
